title: Is there a reason I cannot mystery gift Primetime Draven?
body:
I was trying to gift my brother primetime draven, but when I try and gift it to him it says: 

You are unable to send this giftt for one of the following reasons:
* We are sorry - the system has experienced an error. Please contact us at support.riotgames.com.
Please choose another item.

Nothing is wrong with my brother's account, such as a ban or restriction, or my own. He hasn't received any gifts in about a month, and I haven't given any out, so I don't understand what the issue is. Really don't feel like making a ticket though u.u

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Are you still having this issue? This error generally occurs when you haven't been friends with each other for at least 24 hours. :)

I think you also need to have been friends for a sufficient period of time and both be a certain level. I'd imagine both of those are satisfied though.

In which case I'd suggest a client restart. It may just be a bug to do with Draven and you could wait until tomorrow as well..
